document_data.name: ''Holy Necklace''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Holy necklaces''''' were enchanted pieces of jewelry, used by [[cleric]]s in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Holy necklaces'' appeared to be simple slingshot-shaped metallic [[amulet]].
document_data.Powers: ''Holy necklaces''' magic could be accessed only by clerics. The wearer had an ability to cast ''[[bless]]'' on themselves and three allies.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Halbenet Soladonel]]: a [[moon elf]] [[cleric]] of [[Corellon Larethian]] who worked with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
